name: magic.home.wifi
description: Control LED strips through the Magic Home LED controller

scripts.prepare: if [ ! -d "./lib/magic-home" ]; then git clone https://github.com/martijnpoppen/node-magichome.git ./lib/magic-home && cd ./lib/magic-home && yarn --production=true && rm -rf ./examples && cd ..; fi;

author: Martijn Poppen
